item.title: R Programming Tips
item.description: Preamble Over the past couple of years, Iâ€™ve had the privilege to advance my R skills, as well as acquire useful functions that should aid anyone using R for behavioral science. This list is not exhaustive, but a list of my most used functions, packages, and useful tips! Pipe %>% Operator The pipe operator, written as %>% takes the output of one function and passes it into another function as an argument.
